statement.p: Out of the last 49 days, it rained 14 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{14}}{{49}}={0.28571428571429}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.28571428571429}={28.571428571429} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 28.57 .
